attributes.action: Review finance package, supply every household £300 per week, immediate roll out
attributes.additional_details:
The package offered to help, although very generous is not ready to supply payments to help people cover the cost of living. It will apparently not be ready until June.
For many people this leaves them open and as such will try to continue working when they should not. 

A blanket £300 per week would be possible to roll out immediately relieving the additional stress placed upon people nationally. 

For some waiting until June is just too long. A blanket payment. Cover all types of workers.
attributes.background: Change the financial package to help people during pandemic. By supplying a generic £300 per week to a household everyone can afford to purchase food and will not need to work.
